posts.post_content:
This is one of the best looking T206 cards Ive seen. It is a red portrait Ty Cobb, has been professionally graded and slabbed. Could possibly grade higher if resubmitted, now it is graded at 5 by SGC. Don't let the Georgia peach slip by!
[IMG]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z445/Seaw0lf/Mobile%20Uploads/downsized_0513011729b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z445/Seaw0lf/Mobile%20Uploads/downsized_0513011729c.jpg[/IMG]
